scripts.postinstall: echo 'üõ°Ô∏è Nova Shield installed successfully! Run: nova'
scripts.uninstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const home=require('os').homedir();const novaDir=path.join(home,'.nova-shield');if(fs.existsSync(novaDir)){fs.rmSync(novaDir,{recursive:true,force:true});console.log('‚úÖ Nova Shield files removed');}else{console.log('‚ùå Nova Shield not found');}"
